name: hanzisize-reboot-react
description: Selectively enlarge text of a specific language

scripts.build: cd public && tsc contentScript.ts && tsc background.ts && cd .. && react-scripts build && cd build && sed -i -e '/exports.__esModule = true;/d' contentScript.js background.js && sed -i -e 's#https://storage[.]googleapis[.]com/workbox-cdn/releases/[0-9.]*/workbox-sw.js#/workbox-sw.js#g' service-worker.js && web-ext build && rm background.ts && rm contentScript.ts && cd ../public && rm background.js && rm contentScript.js && cd ..
scripts.update-version-patch: mversion patch && cd public && mversion patch && cd ..
scripts.update-version-minor: mversion minor && cd public && mversion minor && cd ..
scripts.update-version-major: mversion major && cd public && mversion major && cd ..
